mapper.insert: insert into job_history (id, job_type, employee_id, started_date) values (#{id}, #{jobType}, #{employeeId}, #{startedDate})
mapper.select: select id, job_type as jobType, employee_id as employeeId, started_date as startedDate, endedDate as endedDate from job_history where employee_id = #{employeeId} and ended_date is null
mapper.update: update job_history set ended_date = sysdate where employee_id = #{value}
